description: Navigation argument type mismatch causing crashes when navigating between destinations.
commonCauses: Passing String when destination expects Int
Custom Parcelable not matching argument type
Type changed in destination but not at call site
Using wrong Safe Args generated class
Bundle argument type doesn't match navArgument type
solutions: Use Safe Args plugin for type-safe navigation
Validate argument types match destination definition
Use proper NavType for custom types
Implement custom NavType for complex objects
Parse arguments defensively with type checks
Use JSON for complex objects as String argument
Test navigation with various argument combinations
prevention: Always use Safe Args plugin for type safety
Define argument types explicitly in nav graph
Use primitive types when possible (Int, String, Boolean)
Test navigation arguments in instrumented tests
Use sealed classes for type-safe argument passing
